meanings.definition: To come or go into (a place)
meanings.sent1: She is entering the room quietly.
meanings.sent2: The cat is entering the house through the window.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is entering the bird feeder for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight is entering the room, brightening it up.
meanings.sent5: The key is entering the lock smoothly.

meanings.definition: To become a member of (an organization)
meanings.sent1: He is entering the club as a new member.
meanings.sent2: She is entering the company as an intern.
meanings.sent3: The penguin is entering the polar bear club for fun.
meanings.sent4: The new employee is entering the team with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The student is entering the debate club to improve skills.

meanings.definition: To begin to be involved in (a particular activity)
meanings.sent1: They are entering the dance class to learn salsa.
meanings.sent2: The kids are entering the art competition with their paintings.
meanings.sent3: The dog is entering the race, wagging its tail.
meanings.sent4: The chef is entering the cooking competition to showcase skills.
meanings.sent5: The team is entering the tournament to win the trophy.
